sn38.9:4.3: “Yaṃ kho, āvuso, dukkhe aññāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye aññāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe aññāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya aññāṇaṃ—
sn38.9:4.5: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etissā avijjāya pahānāyā”ti?
sn38.9:4.6: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etissā avijjāya pahānāyā”ti.
sn38.9:4.7: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etissā avijjāya pahānāyā”ti?
sn38.9:4.8: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, etissā avijjāya pahānāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38.9:4.11: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā, etissā avijjāya pahānāyā”ti.
sn38.9:4.12: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etissā avijjāya pahānāya.
